name: B. Painting Pebbles
statement:
There are piles of pebbles on the table, the -th pile contains pebbles.
Your task is to paint each pebble using one of the given colors so that
for each color and any two piles and the difference between the number
of pebbles of color in pile and number of pebbles of color in pile is at
most one.In other words, let’s say that is the number of pebbles of
color in the -th pile. Then for any , the following condition must be
satisfied . It isn’t necessary to use all colors: if color hasn’t been
used in pile , then is considered to be zero.
